title: Please, the Sanremo 2015 logo font is?
author: primalinea

comments.content:
I suspect the designer used a pirated version of Capone for the name, given that the year and subtitle appear to be set in a “freemium” typefaced called Caviar Dreams:  
 [http://www.dafont.com/caviar-dreams.font?text=2015](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131257/http:/www.dafont.com/caviar-dreams.font?text=2015 "http://www.dafont.com/caviar-dreams.font?text=2015")
